title: Infinix Note 50 series is coming in early March

And we do mean that - there really isn't much waiting left to do for the devices. text: It's been almost a year since Infinix launched the Note 40 series, and you know what that means, right? The Note 50 series is right around the corner. And we do mean that - there really isn't much waiting left to do for the devices. Infinix has officially started teasing the Note 50 series in Indonesia, and revealed that the devices will become official on March 3. We also get a shot of one of the handsets' camera island. Other than the date and the fact that they will be infused with AI of some sort, which really isn't a big surprise, there are unfortunately no other official details about them. Last year we got a ton of Note 40 variations - seven, to be precise. So the same thing could happen again with their successors, but of course not all of them may launch at the same time. Through a recent FCC certification we know that the Note 50 will be 9 mm thick, and will support NFC, dual-band Wi-Fi, and 45W wired charging. Via
html:
It's been almost a year since Infinix launched the Note 40 series, and you know what that means, right? The Note 50 series is right around the corner. And we do mean that - there really isn't much waiting left to do for the devices.

Infinix has officially started teasing the Note 50 series in Indonesia, and revealed that the devices will become official on March 3. We also get a shot of one of the handsets' camera island.

Other than the date and the fact that they will be infused with AI of some sort, which really isn't a big surprise, there are unfortunately no other official details about them.

Last year we got a ton of Note 40 variations - seven, to be precise. So the same thing could happen again with their successors, but of course not all of them may launch at the same time.

Through a recent FCC certification we know that the Note 50 will be 9 mm thick, and will support NFC, dual-band Wi-Fi, and 45W wired charging.

Via
